senses.sense_definition: Handel die via het internet wordt gedreven; het kopen en verkopen van goederen of diensten online.

examples.text: De <w>internethandel</w> is de laatste jaren enorm toegenomen door nieuwe technologie.

target_lang_translations.en: <w>E-commerce</w> has increased enormously in recent years due to new technology.

examples.text: Veel fysieke winkels richten zich tegenwoordig ook op de internationale <w>internethandel</w>.

target_lang_translations.en: Many physical stores nowadays also focus on international <w>online trade</w>.

target_lang_definitions.en: Trade conducted via the internet; the buying and selling of goods or services online.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: commercial transactions conducted electronically on the internet
the activity of buying and selling goods or services via the internet
